definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: He explained that he was robbing the bank because Santa had to pay his elves.
sentences.chinese: 他竟然说抢银行是为了要给小精灵们付工钱。

sentences.english: Do you still remember the casper in the movie of Hollywood?
sentences.chinese: 还记得好莱坞电影里的小精灵吗？

sentences.english: This is an aqua blue again with a dynamic elf.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个水蓝色小精灵再次充斥活气。

sentences.english: Thellos is an aqua blue again with a dynamic elf.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个水蓝色小精灵再次布满活气。

sentences.english: Dobby was a house-elf who served the Malfoy family.
sentences.chinese: 多比是马尔福家族的家养小精灵。

sentences.english: Now, focus on just one of these sprites.
sentences.chinese: 现在，把注意力集中到其中的一个小精灵。

sentences.english: You more like a naughty elf, and I kept on holding Micang.
sentences.chinese: 你多像一个顽皮的小精灵，和我捉着迷藏。

sentences.english: The little girl is Robin Goodfellow in our class .
sentences.chinese: 这小姑娘是我们班的小精灵。

sentences.english: Kearns is a small man, a few inches taller than elfin.
sentences.chinese: 卡恩斯个子很小，比小精灵高不了几英寸。

sentences.english: It's something like having fairies at the bottom of your garden.
sentences.chinese: 这就像在你的花园里发现了小精灵。

sentences.english: You just caught yourself a leprechaun.
He is a little boy with an elfin face.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个有着小精灵脸庞的小男孩。

sentences.english: We'll also have access to leprechaun pots of gold, which will help us pay down our national debt.
sentences.chinese: 我们还有小精灵锅子里的金子来帮我们还国债了。

sentences.english: There are many elves who help in his toyshop.
sentences.chinese: 在他的玩具店里，有许多小精灵帮忙做玩具。

sentences.english: His name is Pikachu, and he is the best-known character from the phenomenon that is Pokemon.
sentences.chinese: 他的名字叫皮卡丘，是宠物小精灵中最受欢迎的形象。

sentences.english: The elvish child then laughed aloud.
sentences.chinese: 接着那小精灵似的孩子笑出了声。

definition: lit. little princess/fig. spoiled girl/female version of 小皇帝[xiao3 huang2 di4]
Pokémon or Pocket Monsters, popular Japanese video game, anime and manga
